array.string:
The ECPU's start flag did not get set at the start of a run. It looks like it is not running.
There are several things you can do to try to solve this problem: 1)Start a new run. 2)Stop, then start a run with the quick start disabled. 3)Stop the run. Go to the eCPU dialog. Push the stop button. Push the download code button. Restart the run. 4)Stop the run. Push the reset button on the eCPU hardware. Restart run with the quick start disabled. 5)Stop the run. Cycle vme power. Restart the run with the quick start disabled.
Acknowledging this alarm will silence it.
